mapper.select: SELECT IF(RST.COMPLETE_YN = 'N', '예약중', NULL) AS POSSIBLE , VHC.VHC_ID AS VHC_ID , VHC.VHC_NO AS VHC_NO , DL.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_KIND_NM , DL2.DL_CD_NM AS INST_LOC_NM , DVC.MNG_ID AS MNG_ID FROM BM_VHC_INFO VHC LEFT JOIN BM_DVC_INFO DVC ON VHC.VHC_ID = DVC.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL ON DVC.DVC_KIND = DL.DL_CD AND DL.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL2 ON DVC.INST_LOC = DL2.DL_CD AND DL2.CO_CD = 'INST_LOC' LEFT JOIN BM_SCR_RSV_RST RST ON DVC.MNG_ID = RST.MNG_ID AND COMPLETE_YN = 'N' WHERE VHC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DVC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DL.TXT_VAL1 = 'PD' ORDER BY VHC.VHC_ID, DVC.MNG_ID
SELECT FONT_COLOR FROM BM_SCR_INFO WHERE SET_ID = #{value};
